name: Training aim
description: Training aim - This is a game for improving your skills of owning a mouse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 20 MB available space
